1.title: DC Fashion Week, Washington Humane Society & Bruce Vilanch

episode of.title: Being Fabulous Rocks! T.V. Show (TV Series 2015– )

1.plot: On our season premier episode we have an exclusive interview with DC Fashion Week Exec Dir. EAN WILLIAMS about the organization's history, upcoming#DCFashionWeek and community service, then we visit the Washington Humane Society headquarters to chat with them about their community programs and the upcoming 2015 Sugar and Champagne Affair. Finally meet up with 6-time Television Academy / Primetime Emmys/Emmy-Award winning comedy writer/comedian Bruce Vilanch to chat about his career, besties Bette Midler and Elizabeth Taylor who pioneered the fund-raising movement for ...

2.title: Mission Results, Washington Humane Society, Bliss Nightlclub DC, R&B Sensation Ne-Yo

episode of.title: Being Fabulous Rocks! T.V. Show (TV Series 2015– )

2.plot: Included on Being Fabulous Rocks!, the show where BEING FABULOUS is less about your wealth, celebrity or social standing and more about using these attributes to give back to the community, our host, Howard Nelson Cromwell interviews: Results Gym DC founder, Doug Jefferies, about the work he's doing in Haiti with Mission: Results Community Center. Tune in to find out what motivated this businessman, whose love for hospitality and personal training launched the Results Gym DC chain, to open a community center in Haiti and also learn about his FIVE Initiatives to Save ...

3.title: Sugar & Champagne Affair-Washington Humane Society, Affair of the Heart-American Heart Association, DC Fashion Week 2014 Recap

episode of.title: Being Fabulous Rocks! T.V. Show (TV Series 2015– )

3.plot: This episode of #BeingFabulousRocks is super sexy, super glam and super fabulous!!! We head to the sexy Ronald Regan Bldg & International Center for the 2015 Sugar and Champagne Affair by Washington Humane Society an event that honors local crusaders against animal cruelty. We also head to the the fabulous Marriott Wardman Park for the 67th Affair of the Heart Luncheon and Fashion Show benefiting the American Heart Association - Greater Washington Region. We covered this amazing event and talked with some of DC's most powerful women about their involvement, giving ...

4.title: 2015 BET Honors Red Carpet

episode of.title: Being Fabulous Rocks! T.V. Show (TV Series 2015– )

4.plot: On this episode of Being Fabulous Rocks! we head over to the Affair of the Heart Luncheon & Fashion Show to talk Kay Kapoor, the chair of the upcoming 2015 Greater Washington Region Heart Ball, about what you can expect and how you can get involved. When then head over to Historic Thurgood Marshall Center to speak with AL Sura about its 5th Annual AL Sura In Black benefit. To get you geared up for the 2015 BET Honors, we also bring you exclusive footage from our Red Carpet coverage of the 2015 BET Honors, an annual event celebrating the accomplishments of ...

locations: Washington, District of Columbia, USA::(DC Metro Area)
imdb.plot outline: Being Fabulous Rocks! T.V. Show (BFR!) is a thirteen week ½ hour-long trendy magazine talk show series based on the concept of our sister publication, DC's, Miami's and Chicago's MOST FABULOUS Magazines, which is: BEING FABULOUS is less about wealth, celebrity or social standing and more about using these attributes to support to give back the community as a whole. BFR! explores the issues & concerns of Washington, DC metropolitan area urbanites though our in-depth interviews with business owners, taste-makers and celebrities in the industries of arts & culture, restaurants & dining, nightlife & entertainment, fashion & style, business, community & politics. While aiming to highlight businesses/organizations, services and people that are exemplifying social, community and environmental responsibility, BFR! hopes to empower the most discriminating consumers in the metropolitan Washington, DC area with a wealth of information about charity, philanthropy, volunteer-ism and going green while focusing on how our interviewees are using their specific industry to give back to the community.
imdb.title: Being Fabulous Rocks! T.V. Show

BFR! explores the issues & concerns of Washington, DC metropolitan area urbanites though our in-depth interviews with business owners, taste-makers and celebrities in the industries of arts & culture, restaurants & dining, nightlife & entertainment, fashion & style, business, community & politics. While aiming to highlight businesses/organizations, services and people that are exemplifying social, community and environmental responsibility, BFR! hopes to empower the most discriminating consumers in the metropolitan Washington, DC area with a wealth of information about charity, philanthropy, volunteer-ism and going green while focusing on how our interviewees are using their specific industry to give back to the community.::Howard Nelson Cromwell
